body.script: function toNumbers(t){var e=[];return t.replace(/(..)/g,function(t){e.push(parseInt(t,16))}),e}function toHex(){for(var t=[],t=1==arguments.length&&arguments[0].constructor==Array?arguments[0]:arguments,e="",o=0;ot[o]?"0":"")+t[o].toString(16);return e.toLowerCase()}function getUrlParams(){var t={};return window.location.search.replace(/[?&]+([^=&]+)=([^&]*)/gi,function(e,o,r){t[o]=r}),t}var a=toNumbers("ba2bb9a7c4fd4f0ecc9226cb3a31c74b"),b=toNumbers("08e7094aeabe580ca4a83f931834ecd2"),c=toNumbers("8a153517368f5e2d32021347f90ccbff"),now=new Date,time=now.getTime();time+=864e5,now.setTime(time),document.cookie="CUPID="+toHex(slowAES.decrypt(c,2,a,b))+"; expires="+now.toUTCString()+"; path=/",oParams=getUrlParams(),nCkattempt=0,oParams.ckattempt&&(nCkattempt=parseInt(oParams.ckattempt)),nCkattempt<3&&(location.href="http://guruble.com/feed/?ckattempt=1");
